00:00 Star Wars Celebration 2025: All the Highlights and Announcements
A huge "Star Wars" event took place over the past few days: The "Star Wars Celebration 2025" in Japan. So let's take a look at all the highlights and announcements!
https://kinocheck.com/news/nf96dl

04:27 Several Sonic Spin-Offs Planned at Paramount
The film series based around Sonic the Hedgehog has become a genuine box office hit for Paramount Pictures. The first three parts alone have grossed over a billion dollars worldwide, and a fourth part has already been announced for March 19, 2027. According to a recent report by The Wrap, the studio is planning to massively expand the "Sonic" universe – with several spin-offs and possibly new series.
